member.name: T:TankPocalypse.Model.ExtensionMethods
member.summary: This is an extension class, which adds extension methods to the specified type.

member.name: M:TankPocalypse.Model.ExtensionMethods.RotateByAngle(System.Numerics.Vector2,System.Single)
member.summary: Rotates the given vector by the given degree input. Degree value is float.

member.name: M:TankPocalypse.Model.ExtensionMethods.RotateByAngle(System.Numerics.Vector2,System.Double)
member.summary: Rotates the given vector by the given degree input. Degree value is double.

member.name: M:TankPocalypse.Model.ExtensionMethods.VectorAngle(System.Numerics.Vector2,System.Numerics.Vector2)
member.summary: Returns the angle between two vector in degrees.

member.name: M:TankPocalypse.Model.ExtensionMethods.ClampAngleToNearestTheta(System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Clamps the double input angle value to theta if it exceeds theta input.

member.name: M:TankPocalypse.Model.ExtensionMethods.ClampIntegerToNearestTheta(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Clamps the integer input value to theta if it exceeds theta input.

member.name: M:TankPocalypse.Model.ExtensionMethods.ClampAngleToMaxValue(System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Clamps the input double value if it exceeds the maximum value.
member.param: Input value to clamp if exceeds max value.
